item.title: Andy Gill
item.description: Andrew James Dalrymple Gill was a British musician and record producer. He was the lead guitarist for the British rock band Gang of Four, which he co-founded in 1976. Gill was known for his jagged style of guitar on albums such as Entertainment! (1979) and Solid Gold (1981) and hit singles such as 'At Home He's a Tourist,' 'Damaged Goods,' 'Anthrax,' 'What We All Want' and 'I Love a Man in a Uniform'.
